issues.title: Push notifications not appearing on some devices
issues.scenario: Users report they stopped receiving promotional push alerts on Android 12.
issues.rootCause: Background notification permissions were revoked during OS upgrade.
issues.solution: Ask users to open App Settings → Notifications and enable all permissions.

issues.title: Duplicate notifications sent multiple times
issues.scenario: Several users receive the same push message 3–4 times.
issues.rootCause: A server retry loop caused repeated sends when the first delivery wasn’t acknowledged.
issues.solution: Add unique message IDs and deduplicate on the client side to prevent repeats.

issues.title: Button text gets cut off on smaller screens
issues.scenario: On 5-inch devices, long labels on buttons are truncated unexpectedly.
issues.rootCause: Hardcoded button width in dp doesn’t scale properly.
issues.solution: Use `wrap_content` or flexible layout constraints to allow dynamic sizing.

issues.title: Dark mode theme doesn’t apply to dialogs
issues.scenario: Even when the system theme is set to dark, pop-up dialogs remain in light mode.
issues.rootCause: Dialog theme is not inheriting the parent activity theme.
issues.solution: Wrap dialog builders with a dark mode theme context or update theme styles.

issues.title: Card payment fails with generic error
issues.scenario: Some users encounter 'Payment Failed' without any clear reason.
issues.rootCause: The payment gateway returns a timeout error not handled gracefully.
issues.solution: Implement retry with exponential backoff and show descriptive error messages.

issues.title: UPI transactions remain stuck in pending state
issues.scenario: UPI payments are initiated but never return a success or failure callback.
issues.rootCause: Webhooks were not properly configured for async confirmation.
issues.solution: Enable webhook endpoint and verify UPI callback flow to update transaction status.

issues.title: App fails to load content on weak connections
issues.scenario: Users on 2G or weak Wi-Fi get infinite spinners and no error feedback.
issues.rootCause: Timeout settings are too strict, leading to abrupt connection failures.
issues.solution: Increase connection timeout and show a proper retry or offline screen.

issues.title: API calls occasionally return empty responses
issues.scenario: Random GET requests return HTTP 200 but with no data in the body.
issues.rootCause: Server load balancer forwards requests to a misconfigured instance.
issues.solution: Ensure all backend instances return proper payloads and monitor 200-empty anomalies.

issues.title: Password reset link expired too quickly
issues.scenario: Users say the password reset link stops working within minutes.
issues.rootCause: Token expiry time is set to 5 minutes instead of intended 30.
issues.solution: Extend token validity and mention the expiry clearly in the email.

issues.title: Unable to update email address
issues.scenario: Users attempting to change their email get 'Update Failed' errors.
issues.rootCause: Email uniqueness check was not case-insensitive.
issues.solution: Normalize email inputs to lowercase and re-run uniqueness check.

issues.title: App takes too long to start on low-end phones
issues.scenario: Some users experience startup times over 10 seconds.
issues.rootCause: Large asset files and synchronous DB migrations are blocking UI thread.
issues.solution: Defer non-critical initialization and enable lazy loading of assets.

issues.title: Scrolling lags on product list screen
issues.scenario: Long product lists cause frame drops when scrolling quickly.
issues.rootCause: Inefficient image loading without caching.
issues.solution: Use proper image caching libraries and paginate the list.

issues.title: File download never completes on mobile data
issues.scenario: Downloads pause randomly when the user switches from Wi-Fi to mobile data.
issues.rootCause: Download manager does not support network handover mid-transfer.
issues.solution: Implement download resume logic or ask users to retry on stable network.

issues.title: Downloaded files are corrupted
issues.scenario: Some users cannot open downloaded files due to checksum mismatch.
issues.rootCause: Server occasionally sends incomplete file chunks under heavy load.
issues.solution: Enable checksum validation and auto-retry corrupted parts.

issues.title: Notification sound plays twice
issues.scenario: On some Android phones, incoming alerts play sound twice rapidly.
issues.rootCause: Two receivers are registered for the same push event.
issues.solution: Unregister duplicate receivers and ensure singleton notification handler.

issues.title: App logo appears blurry on high-resolution screens
issues.scenario: The splash logo is pixelated on tablets and large phones.
issues.rootCause: Low-density PNG used instead of vector drawable.
issues.solution: Replace bitmap with SVG/vector assets to support all screen densities.

issues.title: Refund status not updated in the app
issues.scenario: Refunds processed by the bank are not reflected in the user’s order history.
issues.rootCause: Missing refund webhook integration on the client side.
issues.solution: Add polling or webhook listener to sync refund status regularly.

issues.title: Intermittent logout due to token refresh failure
issues.scenario: Users are logged out randomly after long idle periods.
issues.rootCause: Silent token refresh fails when device sleeps for extended time.
issues.solution: Handle refresh errors gracefully and prompt re-login only when necessary.

issues.title: Two-factor authentication SMS arrives very late
issues.scenario: Some users receive OTPs after 4–5 minutes delay.
issues.rootCause: Carrier network congestion during peak hours.
issues.solution: Offer alternate email or authenticator app for faster 2FA.

issues.title: Memory usage spikes after prolonged use
issues.scenario: App consumes 1.5GB+ RAM after being open for 1 hour.
issues.rootCause: Image caches are not cleared and views leak in backstack.
issues.solution: Use proper lifecycle scoping and clear caches on backgrounding.

issues.title: Uploads fail on slow internet without warning
issues.scenario: User uploads time out silently on unstable connections.
issues.rootCause: No retry or timeout handling in upload service.
issues.solution: Add exponential retry and user-facing error messages for slow networks.

issues.title: Text overlaps on language switch
issues.scenario: Switching from English to Arabic causes text to overflow and overlap.
issues.rootCause: Layouts aren’t RTL-aware and use fixed positions.
issues.solution: Use `start`/`end` constraints and enable RTL support in manifest.
